body: A mod called Prodigy banned my 4 accounts and i wasn't even hacking. He/she called me i was using an individual website called mcleaks and that im hacking. What do i do?

title: I want to talk about your mods...

replies.body:
Rule §A6:

Ban evasion is not permitted and will result in a permanent ban on all accounts associated with the original Minecraft account.

This means all accounts that are connected to a banned account will be permanently banned for ban evasion.

Also create an appeal here: https://avicus.net/appeal
